title: Weather Data
text: Monitoring and processing the data from Sencrop, Darksky and various other technologies that we operate daily.

title: Satellite & Drones
text: Enhancing the efficiency of your work through automation, reducing man-power.

title: IoT
text: Building various alerts & notifications systems, along with LTE NB-IoT MQTT Connections. We do provide every technology you need.

title: Farm Maps
text: Constructing the automatic maps for your crop fields with your historical data, visualisation and analysis processes.
